TopicTitle: Need some stuff to launch, bored

Articles.Content: Well Ive came to the part of the career where ive launched all gps, mapping sats, scanSAts, and communication sats. Ive built the KISS and Chinese space stations. Ive launched Cacteye and Zues telescopes. Im looking for some mods I might have missed in giving me an excuse to launch some payloads into orbit. Any ideas?
Station science, and MKS/OKS are good ones.

Well, look toward the other planets and start building ground bases and stations with MKS/OKS. You can try building remote tech sat network for all the system if you haven't done so. You can also try collecting asteroids and joined them together to make a sort of minor moon/space stations somewhere.

> 
> what is MKS/OKS ?

A mod by RoverDude that encapsulates building colonies in space and on land and (optionally, using a life support mod) making them sustainable.

It's called [Modular Kolonization Systems/Orbital Kolonization Systems](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79588-0-90-USI-Kolonization-Systems-%28MKS-OKS%29-%280-22-4%29-2015-01-27).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-20T05:38:39Z" title="02/20/2015 05:38  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 20, 2015</time> by DuoDex**

ooooooohhhh, im a bit too early for that , havnt taken a manned mission to Duna yet. I think some satellites are in order to greet the rockets coming in ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Maybe I can send SCANsats there , but will they be usefull there?
You should the lazor missle pack and blow up your work then relaunch it all ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

How about a [Panopticon](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/47/Panopticon_Hi-Viz_Command_Pod)? One of my favorite parts.

Next, try launching payloads into orbit... from other planets! Laythe and Duna are fun.

Have you landed a giant mechanical cow on the Mun yet (otherwise known as Operation [Hey Diddle Diddle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hey_Diddle_Diddle))? That is an important part of any space program, and has only been accomplished once as far as I know. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24599-Post-your-Rover-MEGATHREAD?p=1293083&viewfull=1#post1293083](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24599-Post-your-Rover-MEGATHREAD?p=1293083&viewfull=1#post1293083)

hahahah! what if I model some dinosaurs? and have them strapped with rcs thrusters , I mean thats not crazy right?
